item.title: You Won't Believe What Happened When We Put the iPhone 12 Mini and 13 Mini to the Battery Test - Reddit Reveals All!
item.description: Introduction The introduction of the iPhone 12 Mini and 13 Mini has been met with a lot of excitement and anticipation. With their compact design and powerful features, they promise to be the perfect device for those who want the latest technology without sacrificing portability. But how do they fare when it comes to battery life? To answer this question, we put the two phones to the test and asked Redditors to weigh in on the results.
